meanings.definition: glamorous or showy in an attractive and exciting way
meanings.sent1: The party had the glitziest decorations I had ever seen.
meanings.sent2: She wore the glitziest dress to the event.
meanings.sent3: The glitziest cat in the neighborhood loved to play with shiny toys.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as glitzy as a diamond in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The glitziest fireworks lit up the night sky in a dazzling display.
